channel.title: Comments on: Pundi X Staking: Explained

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Staking is very interesting and gives room for passive income. This ROI is impressive and a standard one for passive income
item.content:encoded:
Staking is very interesting and gives room for passive income.
This ROI is impressive and a standard one for passive income

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: That's really nice that we have many coin/token options for staking with higher returns. Hope Atomic team will add more coins/tokens in future in the staking section.
item.content:encoded: That’s really nice that we have many coin/token options for staking with higher returns. Hope Atomic team will add more coins/tokens in future in the staking section.
